title: IT/Comm/Telecom Policy
description: Examination of the convergence of information technology, communications and telecommunications, policymaking within the executive/regulatory branches, special interest group role, and key domestic and international issues.  Credit not allowed for both PUBP 3502 and PUBP 4512.
